page.title: 14OUR LADY & ST.JOHN'S CHURCH
page.content:
The Catholic Church in Heswall is dedicated to Our Lady and Saint John. The church was built in 1939 and the first parish priest was Fr. Russell. Since then there have been six parish priests. The church holds 320 people and the number of people in theparish is 1560. Before the church was built, the people who lived around here had to go to Neston to Mass. The parish priest today is Fr. Joseph Carney. Last year Fr. Carney had a new organ installed in the church. It is a full pipe organ and was built by Willis the organ builders.
Vikki Gorse 10.
